text:
April 20, 19$$
Mr# Waldo Abbot
Director of Broadcasting
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Waldos
Many thanks to you and your staff for
the special work provided the NAEB radio network
at the time of the polio vaccine conference#
Ed told me in Columbus that you had to
go back to the hospital for a few days rest# You
should know enough to take care of yourself at your
age, and I hereby admonish you#
With all good wishes to you and Ann.
Sincerely yours.
FESjjs
Frank E. Schooley
President
